topics.body:
I don't know if this belongs in the fetish thread, the religion thread, the time wasting thread or such.

*flips a 3 sided coin*
"Eh fuck it; time wasting thread"



So I was reading the scientific explanation to the mythos of succubus and from a scientific viewpoint it's interesting.  It's believed that the mythology of succubus started during the dark ages due to sexual repression; essentially the people who were sexually repressed had sex dreams about demons and they told others that "the devil was trying to sway everyone" and as a result more and more people had sex dreams about succubus because they believed it.

That would be a evil and genius way for a religion nowadays to gain ground; start a equivalent large scale rumor saying that <insert your religious mythological creature> was giving people sex in their sleep meaning that they were chosen to prophet to the people -> that person tells everyone -> other people have sex dreams -> they tell others -> religion spreads like wildfire.

It would especially work in areas that still believe in that sort of thing.  Just start a rumor, spread it all over and constantly and a couple weeks later the entire area is converted.
